name: Planetslayer
description:
While travelling through hyperspace, you stumble upon an enemy armada advancing towards Earth. Leading the advance is the dreaded enemy flagship known as the Planetslayer, a large starship capable of destroying entire civilizations. With no hope of reaching Earth before the armada, you realize that the only way to save your homeworld is to take on the armada yourself.

You must defeat...

The Planetslayer.

A Windows executable can be downloaded below.

Game by Turnovus (Website)

Music by Sam D-T Music (Soundcloud)
